product_overview: PetShop Romeo & Julieta is a premium single-page web application designed for pet owners to manage pet care services, appointments, e-commerce shopping, and subscription plans in a seamless and intuitive environment. It utilizes a modern tech stack highlighted by React, TypeScript, and Supabase to deliver a responsive, secure, and engaging user experience.
core_goals: Provide a comprehensive pet care management system combining pet profiles, appointment booking, and health tracking.
Deliver a seamless e-commerce experience with a robust product catalog, shopping cart, and checkout process.
Enable users to manage their profiles and pets efficiently with secure authentication and profile controls.
Support administrators with a powerful dashboard for managing users, appointments, products, and system metrics.
Offer subscription plans and real-time notifications to enhance user engagement and retention.
Ensure high quality through performance optimization, robust error handling, and extensive automated testing.
key_features: Complete authentication system with login, registration, password recovery, and profile management integrating Supabase Auth.
Full CRUD for pet profiles including detailed health, personality, and growth journey tracking.
Multi-step appointment booking system with service selection, pet selection, schedule availability, and confirmation with check-in functionality.
E-commerce store with product catalog, filtering, shopping cart, coupons, and secure checkout process.
User dashboard offering live service feed, upcoming appointment overview, pets management, subscription status, and personalized statistics.
Admin dashboard for user and appointment management, system monitoring, reports, and ticket-based support system.
Subscription system facilitating premium plans with benefits such as discounts, cashback, and priority service.
Real-time notification system supporting multiple channels including email, WhatsApp, push and in-app notifications.
Address management with CEP lookup and validation, plus coupon and care extras services integrated.
Robust error handling with Sentry integration and performance monitoring tools.
Comprehensive testing suite covering unit, integration, and UI tests to ensure stability and performance.
user_flow_summary: New user onboarding from registration, email confirmation to profile and pet setup.
Booking a service flow including choosing services, pets, extras, time slots and final confirmation.
Buying products in the store with product search, filtering, adding to cart, checkout and payment management.
User profile management with editing personal info, notification preferences, password change, and payment methods.
Admin tasks including login, dashboard access, managing users, viewing reports and handling support tickets.
Service providers and users performing real-time check-ins and receiving notifications about appointment status and promotions.
validation_criteria: Full user authentication flow with secure login, registration, and password recovery operates without errors.
Pet management CRUD operations function correctly including validations for pet details and health data.
Appointment booking process completes correctly respecting availability, service selections, and user confirmation.
E-commerce features support correct product display, cart calculations, coupon application, and secure checkout.
Responsive UI adapts properly to mobile, tablet, and desktop with smooth animations and loading times under 3 seconds.
Data validations including CPF, CEP, phone formatting and input sanitization are enforced.
Error monitoring captures and logs issues via Sentry with appropriate user feedback.
Subscription and notification systems operate reliably with multi-channel support.
Administrative functionalities cover user and appointment management, reporting, and ticket handling with access control.
Testing suite achieves over 80% coverage with passing unit, integration and UI tests ensuring performance and usability.
